SELECT sysm1.menu_id AS id, sysm1.menu_code AS code, sysm1.menu_code AS pcode, sysm1.menu_name AS name FROM sys_menu AS sysm1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sysm2 ON sysm1.menu_pcode = sysm2.menu_code WHERE sysm1.menu_is_menu = 1 ORDER BY sysm1.menu_order ASC

SELECT sysm1.menu_id AS id, sysm1.menu_code AS `code`, sysm1.menu_pcode AS pcode, sysm1.menu_icon AS icon, sysm1.menu_name AS `name`, sysm1.menu_path AS path, sysm1.menu_order AS `order`, sysm1.menu_is_menu AS isMenu, sysm2.menu_id AS pid FROM sys_menu AS sysm1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sysm2 ON sysm1.menu_pcode = sysm2.menu_code INNER JOIN ( SELECT menu_id FROM sys_menu WHERE menu_id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM sys_relation AS sysr WHERE sysr.role_id = #{roleId} ) ) AS sysm3 ON sysm1.menu_id = sysm3.menu_id WHERE sysm1.menu_is_menu = 1 ORDER BY sysm1.menu_order ASC
